title: 2nd International Conference on Natural products, Medicinal Plants, and Traditional Medicines
description: Book Tickets for 2nd International Conference on Natural products, Medicinal Plants, and Traditional Medicines Hosted By Natural Medicine Conference. Event starts on Thursday, 14 September 2023 and happening at Grand Hyatt, Berlin, BE. Register or Buy Tickets, Price information.
cleaned_text: Grand Hyatt, Marlene-Dietrich-platz 2, Berlin, Germany, 10785 Natural Medicine is a term involving various Medical and Paramedical personnel in the use of Natural substances and Therapies to promote healing and improve health. To stay updated with the current research findings in this field Longdom Group SA extends immense pleasure in inviting you to join the 2nd International Conference on Natural Products Medicinal Plants and Traditional Medicines. It is one of the leading Natural Medicine conferences scheduled for September 14-16 2023 in Berlin Germany. Natural Medicine 2023 conference is mainly organized to focus on the theme Recent Traditional Evaluation of Healing Power by Nature. The aim is to engage empower evolve and explore knowledge among both academicians and industry personnel. A conference on Natural Medicine 2023 would likely focus on the latest research and development in the field of Natural Medicines and Herbal Remedies. It may bring together Researchers Healthcare practitioners and Industry professionals to encompass a wide range of practices including Herbal medicine Acupuncture Chiropractic Massage therapy Homeopathy and Naturopathy. Tickets for 2nd International Conference on Natural products, Medicinal Plants, and Traditional Medicines can be booked here. Event Photos
